ui:options.title: Recipients Configuration
ui:options.description: Define the recipients and their corresponding percentages for the distribution.

alerts.text:
Ensure the recipient list is valid by meeting these criteria:
  • The list must not be empty.
  • Percentage amounts should be entered as decimal values (e.g., enter 0.05 for 5%) and the total should not exceed 1 (100%).
  • A maximum of 100 recipients can be set.

ui:options.title: Distribution Percentage
ui:options.description: Enter the recipient's percentage as a decimal (e.g., enter 0.05 for 5%). The total of all percentages must not exceed 1.

ui:options.title: Recipient Information
ui:options.description: Enter the details of the recipient. This includes the Andromeda address, an optional IBC recovery address, and an optional message.

ui:options.title: Recipient Address
ui:options.description: Enter the Andromeda address of the recipient.

ui:options.title: IBC Recovery Address (Optional)
ui:options.description: Provide an optional IBC recovery address.

ui:options.title: Message (Optional)
ui:options.description: Include an optional message for the recipient.
ui:options.placeholder: e.g., Custom message or leave empty
